Class ParticleSystem3D

java.lang.Object
  ParticleSystem
      ParticleSystem3D

public class ParticleSystem3D
extends ParticleSystem

The Particle System class defines a system of particles. It has a number of particles, and a radius which describes the maximum lateral distance a particle can reach from the center of the system before being removed.

Author:
Christopher Glasz
